ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 285
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m not sure about dwarfs bus as long as you have sow,and they are not a spellcasters, you should be able to kite them. Iwas able to kite level 31 avocets
ygData.messageBody:
__________
>
> Message: 1
> Date: 27 Jan 2000 21:23:41 -0000
> From: jeff.belcher@...
> Subject: Dwarves at Dock in Butcher Block
>
> I am currently level 34, and I am almost level 35.
> Without getting into the debate about whether
> Wizards should or should not solo, does anyone know
> if I can solo the dwarves at the BB dock at level
> 35? I have killed them in a group and I have seen
> level 35 pet classes soloing them, but I am not sure
> if a wizzie can solo them at 35. Anyone soloed them
> at 35? If not, has anyone soloed them? If so, what
> level?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Gantorek Ttefabob of Clan Cathar on the Povar Server
>
>

I'm not sure about dwarfs bus as long as you have
sow,and they are not a spellcasters, you should be
able to kite them. Iwas able to kite level 31 avocets
at level 29, so i'm pretty much sure it's possible
